mapper.select: SELECT bno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bfname, nick, comment_count FROM ( SELECT b.bno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, to_char(b.bdate,'mm/dd') bdate, b.bfname, a.nick, c_count.comment_count, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COALESCE(c_count.comment_count, 0) DESC) as rnk FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bno, COUNT(*) as comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY bno ) c_count ON b.bno = c_count.bno LEFT JOIN account a ON b.aid = a.aid ) WHERE rnk <= 5
